name: AAA Westvleteren 12 (D-180 variation)
ingredients: 12.5 lbs Dingemann's Belgian Pilsner, 2.00 lbs Dingemann's Belgian Pale, 0.10 lbs Belgian Debittered Black, 0.15 lbs Belgian Special B, 3.00 lbs D-180 Candi Syrup, 8.0 gallons (filtered), Brewers Gold 1.00 oz 60 min, Hersbrucker 1.00 30 min, Styrian Goldings 1.00 15 min, White Labs WL 530 Westmalle strain (2.0 liter starter), 1 cap of servomyces, 2 tsp gypsum
